mlr3featsel 0.1.0.9000

Conditional mutual information based feature selection

Source: R/FilterMIM.R
FilterMIM.Rd
Conditional mutual information based feature selection filter

Usage

filter = FilterMIM$new()

Details

$new() creates a new object of class FilterMIM.

  • $calculate(task) calculates the filter values.

  • $new() creates a new object of class Filter.

  • $filter() filters a Task using specific criteria

    • returns a subsetted Task

  • $id stores an identifier for this Filter.

  • $filter_values stores the calculated filter values.

  • $packages stores the names of required packages.

  • $settings is a list of hyperparamter settings for this Filter.

See also

Other Filter: FilterAUC, FilterCMIM, FilterDISR, FilterGainRatio, FilterInformationGain, FilterJMIM, FilterJMI, FilterKruskalTest, FilterLinearCorrelation, FilterNJMIM, FilterRankCorrelation, FilterSymmetricalUncertainty, FilterVariance, Filter

Examples

task = mlr3::mlr_tasks$get("iris")
filter = FilterMIM$new()
filter$calculate(task)
#> <FilterMIM>
#>   Inherits from: <Filter>
#>   Public:
#>     calculate: function (task, settings = self$settings) 
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     feature_types: numeric factor ordered
#>     filter_abs: function (task, abs) 
#>     filter_perc: function (task, perc) 
#>     filter_thres: function (task, threshold) 
#>     filter_values: 0.989367623612268 0.936461369966013 0.505930764646486 0. ...
#>     id: FilterMIM
#>     initialize: function (id = "FilterMIM", settings = list()) 
#>     packages: praznik
#>     settings: list
#>     task_type: classif
#>   Private:
#>     .calculate: function (task, settings) 
head(as.data.table(filter), 3)
#>            name     value
#> 1:  Petal.Width 0.9893676
#> 2: Petal.Length 0.9364614
#> 3: Sepal.Length 0.5059308
